outputSpeech.ssml: <speak>With History Buff, you can get historical events for any day of the year.  For example, you could say today, or August thirtieth. Now, which day do you want?</speak>

card.content: With History Buff, you can get historical events for any day of the year.  For example, you could say today, or August thirtieth. Now, which day do you want?
card.title: More events on this day in history

outputSpeech.text: Do you want to know more about what happened on this date?
